channel.title: Transport on Steph de Silva
channel.description: Recent content in Transport on Steph de Silva

item.title: The keys to the kingdom
item.description: I started a new job last week. On day 2, the boss said to me “What do you know about transport and GIS?”, to which I gamely replied (with more honesty than career sense) “nothing!” So here I am working on transport and GIS. She who brags about being a fast learner in interviews reaps what she sows. As it turns out, both transport and GIS are awesome. But how do you get up to speed really, really quickly?
